title: Animal Genius
overview: In Animal Genius, wildlife biologist Liz Bonnin travels the world in search of the genius ways animals survive. Teaming up with world-leading experts, Bonnin unpacks the latest science about animals that we only thought we knew. From a unique meerkat language in Africa's Kalahari Desert to how baby sea turtles hatch in unison on the beaches of Mexico, Bonnin hopes to discover the secrets behind their effective teamwork.
